.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.2.1 (2020-06-24)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release

0.2.4 (2022-03-17)
++++++++++++++++++

* Paths module: Supports passing a format string now
* Logger module: Can now set logging level 0-4. Also added colorized output.

0.2.5 (2022-06-03)
++++++++++++++++++

* Bugfix: Change in streamhandler for Logging module
